job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-25T17:20:57.000Z", "description": "

One of the most recognized brands in the world is looking to hire a Senior Data Scientist to join their Advanced Analytics team focused on direct-to-consumer business.


The Senior Data Scientist will collaborate with a team of data scientists and business stakeholders to clearly communicate meaningful insights to internal audiences. This person will have the ability to tell a story with data.

 

 Responsibilities:


  • Play a crucial role in understanding their customers through detailed analysis
  • Develop statistical/econometric methods, machine learning techniques and big data solutions to forecast consumer demand and determine optimal level of investment in various stages of the supply chain. 
  • Assess business requirements and constraints to make trade-off recommendations between speed and accuracy of alternative solution approaches.     
  • Identify and apply appropriate methods to acquire, explore, cleanse, and fuse data from different sources.      
  • Support the adoption of analytic products through effective storytelling and collaboration with key partners.
  • Partner with Demand and Supply Management as well as Data Science and Engineering


 

Required:


  • 5-10+ years of related Analytic/ Data Science experience
  • MS in Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science or related field
  • Expert live Python, SQL, Machine Learning and Predictive Modeling
  • Ability to tell a story with data
